recipes.lwrp_demo::do_source_pull: Pull source from some repository configured at runtime.

long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

This cookbook uses a chef lightweight resource called 'repo' to define a 
generic interface for downloading contents of a source repository.

= REQUIREMENTS:

Chef Version >= 0.8.tbd

= ATTRIBUTES: 

 * destination - where to put the repo locally (ex. /tmp/myrepo )

= USAGE:

 See /config/chef.json for example to use with Chef Solo.
description: Demonstrates the use of the Dependency Injection cookbook design patterns
name: lwrp_demo

lwrp_demo\/destination.description: Path to download repository contents to.
